title: Stuck in bronze 4ver
body: So....I started playing LoL again a few months ago , I gave my account to a *not skillful* friend so when I logged back on I was in bronze V. It didn't matter much because I was always a bronze or bottom silver player. Thus I began playing my 10 ranked games for this season's division. To my surprise my teams were fairly good and I played good maybe really good in some occasions. Anyway I won 8 out of 10 games and I was sure I made it to Bronze I (at least you fight for silver promotion).Aaaaand there it is once again.....BRONZE FUCKING 5....ty riot now I've lost interest in playing ranked.

replies.body:
LOLOLOLOL
You belong where you belong.
You stay in bronze cuz u play like bronze.
search me on op.gg
If you are way better than ur division. u will get high win
And tbh, bronze is fun place to play in.
No matter what u do, u always win.:))

You appear to have never played anything past your placement games, in which it seems you got carried.

Carry on..

man saltyness on silver is real.
isnt the silver full of people that has leesin's eye/braindead????

lololololololol nothing to say=got carried=92%winrate on bronze smurf???

braindead alert!!!!!!!!!!
Just so you know, sharing an account is a banable offense.  So I probably wouldn't go advertising that information on the message boards.
You started your thread with an instaban statement.
